item.description:
The game is on against the Baltimore Ravens. Please RSVP now or ASAP as this event has been announced to 4 meetup groups and space will become limited due to space limitations and the popularity of the game. The winner goes to the Super Bowl!

This is for the suburban Natives.

The Red Sox Natives have been organizing Patriots Game Watching Events over the past 3 months with up to 60 people attending at Boston, Wakefield and Woburn venues.

This week we will return to one of our suburban venues on Sunday January 22 at 2:00pm to watch the Patriots play in the AFC Championship Game. We watched the Pats beat the Broncos at Harrington's on December 18. 

Harrington's Food and Spirits in downtown Wakefield is a cozy Irish Restaurant and Pub with two floors. We have been there before. The food is great and the full menu will be available for purchase. Owners Lisa and Dan have offerred us a section of the first floor bar area to watch the game. 

Arrive early and get yourself a prime seat and enjoy some pre-game socializing.  

Game Time is 3:00pm 

Many people will stay for the NFC Championship game that begins at 6:30pm. 

There is free parking in downtown Wakefield in the public lot across from Harrington's in front of Bank of America and along Water and Main Streets. The location is T accessible by the 136 and 137 Bus from the Orange Line in Malden Center. And Commuter Rail accessible from North Station via the Haverhill Train stopping at Wakefield Station with a less than 10 minute walk up Albion Street, right on to Main Street and 1 block to Water Street. If you are joining us from the City this is the way to go.

There is no cover.

Everyone is responsible for their own food/drink. PLEASE MAINTAIN YOUR OWN TAB OR PAY AS YOU ORDER AND TIP YOUR SERVERS! 

Please RSVP early if you think you can attend. Invite, guests, friends, and co-workers. Soon we will invite several other groups to join us so space may become limited. Let's have as many Natives there as possible and take over Harrington's!

The following groups are participating:

Red Sox Natives

Wakefield Weeknights (Melody)

Boston Happy Hour (Tonya)

Single Geeks, Nerds & Professionals (Alison) 

 

We hope to see you there.

Fenway Frank and The Red Sox Natives Team
item.how_to_find_us: We will be on the first floor and at the bar
item.name: Patriots AFC Championship Game Viewing - Patriots vs Ravens at Harrington's
